title: pre-season update
body:
you know how its saying on league to get the most out of your shards because of the pre-season update

what is that supposed to mean?

like shards are gonna be worthless or what

thank you

replies.body:
Make sure you read up on all the big changes coming to IP, Runes, and Blue Essence over on the [**Preseason Update**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/preseason-update) page. We've also got a nice little [**Preseason FAQ**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115012640908-Preseason-Update-FAQ) as well. 

Feel free to drop back here and ask for me to clear anything up you might not have fully understood ^_^!

They are changing the way essence works.
When the pre-season changes hit your essence (both Blue and Orange) will be worth less, meaning you will need MORE of it to unlock things you have sitting.

If you want a champion or skin shard made permanent then before the new patch hits it's best to try your hardest to use the shard since once the changes come into place it will cost more for the shard to be used as the scaling changes.

You can read more here: https://nexus.leagueoflegends.com/en-us/2017/09/upcoming-changes-to-leveling-ip-rewards/ 
More general preseason article: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115012640908
There is a full video explaining everything here: 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Yq2i6RDmbNc
